title: Calories in a Gala Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in gala apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for one medium fruit.
assumptions: Medium gala apple (~182 g with skin), raw, unpeeled; values based on USDA data for typical size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium gala apple provides ~95 kcal, 25 g carbs, and 4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one gala apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for a medium gala apple with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a gala apple?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g total carbs, including 4.4 g fiber and 19 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a gala apple have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.3 g fat and 0.5 g protein per medium apple.

faqs.q: Are gala apples low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, only ~2 mg sodium, making them heart-friendly.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in gala apple?
faqs.a: Smaller apples have fewer calories (e.g., ~67 kcal); larger ones more (up to 116 kcal).
